metadata.name: ETW Trace Evasion Activity
metadata.comment: Detects command line activity that tries to clear or disable any ETW trace log which could be a sign of logging evasion.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/trace')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('clear-log')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/trace')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/e:false')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('set-log')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/e:false')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('logman')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('update')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trace')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--p')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-ets')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('remove-etwtraceprovider')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('set-etwtraceprovider')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0x11'))))

output.summary: Detects command line activity that tries to clear or disable any ETW trace log which could be a sign of logging evasion.
